description: This file defines the ClickUpTools class, a Python implementation for interacting with the ClickUp API. It includes methods for listing tasks, creating, updating, deleting tasks, and managing spaces and lists within ClickUp, utilizing requests for HTTP communication and integrating with a Toolkit base class.

classes.name: ClickUpTools
classes.description: A class providing methods to interact with the ClickUp API, including task management and space/list retrieval.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Constructor initializing API credentials, setting up available tools, and inheriting from Toolkit.

methods.name: _make_request
methods.description: Internal method to perform HTTP requests to the ClickUp API with error handling.

methods.name: _find_by_name
methods.description: Internal method to find an item in a list by name, supporting exact and regex matching.

methods.name: _get_space
methods.description: Internal method to retrieve space information by name.

methods.name: _get_list
methods.description: Internal method to retrieve list information within a space by name.

methods.name: _get_tasks
methods.description: Internal method to retrieve tasks from a list.

methods.name: list_tasks
methods.description: Public method to list all tasks in a specified space.

methods.name: create_task
methods.description: Public method to create a new task in a specified space.

methods.name: list_spaces
methods.description: Public method to list all spaces in the workspace.

methods.name: list_lists
methods.description: Public method to list all lists within a specified space.

methods.name: get_task
methods.description: Public method to retrieve details of a specific task by ID.

methods.name: update_task
methods.description: Public method to update a task by ID with provided fields.

methods.name: delete_task
methods.description: Public method to delete a task by ID.
